mapper.select: SELECT l.lesson_num, l.lesson_title, l.lesson_date, l.lesson_info, l.lesson_img, t.tiper_user_id, t.tiper_info FROM lesson l inner join tiper t on l.lesson_tiper_code = t.tiper_code WHERE lesson_num=#{lesson_num}

SELECT l.lesson_num, l.lesson_title, l.lesson_date, l.lesson_info, l.lesson_img, t.tiper_user_id, t.tiper_info FROM lesson l inner join tiper t on l.lesson_tiper_code = t.tiper_code where 1=1 AND LESSON_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{lesson_search}, '%')
AND TIPER_USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{lesson_search}, '%')
ORDER BY l.lesson_num

select escrow.ESCROW_START, lesson.LESSON_TITLE, escrow.ESCROW_USER_ID, FORMAT(escrow.ESCROW_PRICE, 0) AS escrow_price, lesson.lesson_num, escrow.ESCROW_STATUS, escrow.escrow_report_user as lesson_onoff FROM escrow, lesson WHERE #{lesson_tiper_code} = escrow.ESCROW_tiper_code AND lesson.LESSON_NUM = escrow.ESCROW_LESSON_NUM AND escrow.ESCROW_STATUS < 2 ORDER BY escrow.ESCROW_STATUS, escrow.ESCROW_START
mapper.update: update lesson set lesson_title = #{lesson_title}, lesson_info = #{lesson_info}, lesson_img = #{lesson_img} where lesson_num = #{lesson_num}
update lesson set lesson_title = #{lesson_title}, lesson_info = #{lesson_info} where lesson_num = #{lesson_num}
mapper.insert: insert into lesson(lesson_tiper_code, lesson_title, lesson_info, lesson_cate, lesson_img, lesson_user_name) values(#{lesson_tiper_code}, #{lesson_title}, #{lesson_info}, #{lesson_cate}, #{lesson_img}, #{lesson_user_name})
mapper.select: SELECT (select count(*) from escrow where escrow_lesson_num = lesson_num) AS lesson_onoff, lesson_img, lesson_title, lesson_num FROM lesson WHERE lesson_tiper_code = #{lesson_tiper_code}
select count(*) from escrow where escrow_lesson_num = #{lesson_num} and (escrow_status = 1 or escrow_status = 0)
select escrow_report_user as lesson_onoff from escrow where escrow_lesson_num = #{lesson_num} AND escrow_user_id= #{lesson_user_id}
select count(*) from escrow where escrow_lesson_num = #{lesson_num} and escrow_status = 0

select lesson.LESSON_TITLE, lesson.LESSON_USER_NAME, lesson.LESSON_CATE, escrow.ESCROW_LESSON_NUM, escrow.ESCROW_START, escrow.ESCROW_REPORT_STATUS, lesson.LESSON_IMG, lesson.LESSON_NUM, lesson.LESSON_USER_NAME from lesson, escrow where (select user_id from users WHERE user_id =#{lesson_info}) = escrow.ESCROW_USER_ID AND (SELECT escrow_lesson_num WHERE escrow_user_id = #{lesson_info}) = lesson.LESSON_NUM AND escrow.ESCROW_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY ESCROW_NUM desc

select lesson.LESSON_TITLE, lesson.LESSON_USER_NAME, lesson.LESSON_CATE, escrow.ESCROW_LESSON_NUM, escrow.ESCROW_START, escrow.ESCROW_USER_ID, escrow.ESCROW_REPORT_STATUS, lesson.LESSON_IMG, lesson.LESSON_NUM, lesson.LESSON_USER_NAME from lesson, escrow where (select user_id from users WHERE user_id =#{lesson_info}) = escrow.ESCROW_USER_ID AND (SELECT escrow_lesson_num WHERE escrow_user_id = #{lesson_info}) = lesson.LESSON_NUM AND escrow.ESCROW_STATUS = 2 ORDER BY ESCROW_NUM desc

select lesson.LESSON_TITLE, lesson.LESSON_USER_NAME, lesson.LESSON_CATE, escrow.ESCROW_LESSON_NUM, escrow.ESCROW_START, escrow.ESCROW_USER_ID, lesson.LESSON_IMG, lesson.LESSON_NUM, lesson.LESSON_USER_NAME, (SELECT USER_ID FROM USERS u WHERE u.USER_ID = (SELECT tiper.TIPER_USER_ID FROM tiper WHERE tiper.TIPER_CODE = escrow.ESCROW_TIPER_CODE)) AS "TIPER_USER_ID" from lesson, escrow where (select user_id from users WHERE user_id =#{lesson_info}) = escrow.ESCROW_USER_ID AND (SELECT escrow_lesson_num WHERE escrow_user_id = #{lesson_info}) = lesson.LESSON_NUM AND escrow.ESCROW_STATUS = 0 ORDER BY ESCROW_NUM desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ESCROW WHERE ESCROW_USER_ID=#{escrow_user_id} AND ESCROW_LESSON_NUM=#{escrow_lesson_num}
